alert.note: Alert for Niagara (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 19 at 12:58AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Niagara county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4291 7798 4310 7843 4306 7895 4281 7887 4259 7911 4227 7975 4212 7978 4244 7890 4252 7834 4263 7809 TIME Y22M11D19T0000Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z COORD...4312 7837 4312 7845 4336 7848 4336 7866 4328 7903 4298 7902 4297 7890 4279 7887 4278 7878 4297 7845 TIME Y22M11D19T1200Z-Y22M11D20T0000Z COORD...4314 7819 4312 7845 4334 7845 4338 7859 4328 7903 4309 7906 4279 7887 4278 7848 4286 7847 4288 7817 TIME Y22M11D20T0000Z-Y22M11D20T1200Z COORD...4314 7819 4308 7873 4303 7883 4304 7901 4298 7902 4294 7891 4279 7887 4278 7848 4286 7847 4288 7817 TIME Y22M11D20T1200Z-Y22M11D20T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
